dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT loc, contract, commodity, destination_port, mt_weight mt_weight, mt_applied mt_applied, boxes boxes, customer, customer_name, begin_sail, end_sail, booking, load_port, bkg_dest_port, carrier, voyage_name, voyage_number, est_mt_weight, est_boxes, applied_mt, applied_boxes, ship_date, arrival_date, note, tot_est_mt_weight, tot_est_boxes, tot_applied_mt, tot_applied_boxes FROM VIEW_SHIPPING_SCHEDULE WHERE CONCAT('SCOULAR.', customer) = :CUSTOMERID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(loc, 'Data Missing in System') loc, NVL(contract, 'Data Missing in System') contract, NVL(commodity, 'Data Missing in System') commodity, NVL(destination_port, 'Data Missing in System') destination_port, NVL(mt_weight, 'Data Missing in System') mt_weight, NVL(mt_applied, 'Data Missing in System') mt_applied, NVL(boxes, 'Data Missing in System') boxes, NVL(customer, 'Data Missing in System') customer, NVL(customer_name, 'Data Missing in System') customer_name, NVL(begin_sail, 'Data Missing in System') begin_sail, NVL(end_sail, 'Data Missing in System') end_sail, NVL(booking, 'Data Missing in System') booking, NVL(load_port, 'Data Missing in System') load_port, NVL(bkg_dest_port, 'Data Missing in System') bkg_dest_port, NVL(carrier, 'Data Missing in System') carrier, NVL(voyage_name, 'Data Missing in System') voyage_name, NVL(voyage_number, 'Data Missing in System') voyage_number, NVL(est_mt_weight, 'Data Missing in System') est_mt_weight, NVL(est_boxes, 'Data Missing in System') est_boxes, NVL(applied_mt, 'Data Missing in System') applied_mt, NVL(applied_boxes, 'Data Missing in System') applied_boxes, NVL(ship_date, 'Data Missing in System') ship_date, NVL(arrival_date, 'Data Missing in System') arrival_date, NVL(note, 'Data Missing in System') note, NVL(tot_est_mt_weight, 'Data Missing in System') tot_est_mt_weight, NVL(tot_est_boxes, 'Data Missing in System') tot_est_boxes, NVL(tot_applied_mt, 'Data Missing in System') tot_applied_mt, NVL(tot_applied_boxes, 'Data Missing in System') tot_applied_boxes FROM VIEW_SHIPPING_SCHEDULE WHERE CONCAT('SCOULAR.', customer) = :CUSTOMERID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' ORDER BY contract, begin_sail, end_sail, booking, ship_date, arrival_date
